name.en: Advanced Electric Motor Drives and Control

remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修。

goal.en: "Assure students familiar the technologies of power converters, motor drives and their important applications."
goal.ch: "Assure students familiar the technologies of power converters, motor drives and their important applications."

content.en:
"課程概述：Electric machines have been the workhorses of industry for many years. Combined with the advanced power electronics, microprocessor technologies and control theories, the electric motor drives have become sophisticated, and make many high-performance industrial applications possible. Therefore, for the graduated students major in electric power and control, the knowledge of the modern technologies of the electric motor drives is necessary.
課程目標：Assure students familiar the technologies of power converters, motor drives and their important applications.
Power Converters
1. Introduction to power semiconductor devices
2. Switch-mode DC-DC converters
3. Switch-mode DC-AC inverters
Fundamental Motor Drives
4. DC motor drives
5. Induction motor drives
6. Synchronous motor drives
Advanced Motor Drives
7. D-Q model of AC machines
8. Vector control of AC machines
9. Ultrasonic motor drives
Paper Study
10. Final Presentation"
